Posts.Content: Apr 17, 2018 11:40PM Sallyomally wrote: Had my port placement done about four weeks ago. I was awake throughout the procedure and did not feel a thing. The actual thing took a bit longer than expected because there was a slight issue with the cath "curling" as they said, but once it was in place I barely noticed it. Had my first flush done yesterday and was told it is working perfectly. Good luck! It's a simple procedure and goes surprisingly fast.
Posts.Title: Chemo Port-O-Caths: Did you get one? What was is like? buttercup1 exbrnxgrl
